text: Nikolai Viktorovich Osyanin () (December 12, 1941 – March 21, 2022) was a Soviet football player. He made his debut for USSR for a short time in 1965. He did not play again for the national team again until 1969. Osyanin died on March 21, 2022 at the age of 80.Не стало бывшего игрока «Спартака» Николая Осянина ==References== Category:1941 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Russian footballers Category:Russian football managers
title: Nikolai Osyanin
